price: Allah, elbette (O'na gönülden) iman edenleri de bilir, iki yüzlüleri de bilir (ortaya çıkaracaktır).
arabic: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walayaʿlamanna al-lahu alladhīna āmanū walayaʿlamanna al-munāfiqīna
translations: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
And He will surely make evident
